Event.Message: CAD: Internal Error Occurred in Function %1 Line %2. Error Code is %3
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Function" inType="win:AnsiString" outType="xs:string"/> <data name="Line" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ErrorCode" inType="win:HexInt32" outType="win:HexInt32"/> </template>

Event.Message: CAD: Notifying Battery Driver - Id:%1 MaxCurrent:%2 Info:%3 Status:%4 ChargerId:%5
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PowerSourceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MaxChargeCurrent" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PowerSourceInformation" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PowerSourceStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ChargerId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: CAD: Power Source Update Call - Id:%1 MaxCurrent:%2 Info:%3 Status:%4 ChargerId:%5
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PowerSourceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MaxChargeCurrent" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PowerSourceInformation" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PowerSourceStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ChargerId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: CAD: Start Charging IOCTL Call - Id:%1 MaxCurrent:%2 Info:%3 Status:%4 ChargerId:%5
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PowerSourceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MaxChargeCurrent" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PowerSourceInformation" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PowerSourceStatus" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ChargerId" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: CAD: Stop Charging IOCTL Call - Id:%1
CAD: Source Change Notification - Id:%1 SourceOnline:%2
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PowerSourceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="SourceOnline" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: CAD: Battery Status - Capacity:%1 FullChargedCapacity:%2 Voltage:%3 Rate:%4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Capacity" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="FullChargedCapacity" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Voltage" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Rate" inType="win:Int32" outType="xs:int"/> </template>

Event.Message: CAD-BAT: Notify Generic Charger Status - Size:%1 BatteryTag:%2 InformationLevel:%3 ChargingSourceType:%4 VaData:%5
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Size" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="BatteryTag" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InformationLevel" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ChargingSourceType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="VaData" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: CAD-BAT: Notify Charger Status Result - BatteryTag:%1 InformationLevel:%2 ChargingSourceType:%3 Status:%4
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="BatteryTag" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InformationLevel" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ChargingSourceType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Status" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> </template>

Event.Message: USB-CAD: Power Source Update Usb - PowerSourceId:%1 Version:%2 Flags:%3 MaxCurrent:%4 Voltage:%5 PortType:%6 PortId:%7 PowerSourceInformation:%8 OemCharger:%9
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="PowerSourceId" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Version" inType="win:UInt16" outType="xs:unsignedShort"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MaxCurrent" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Voltage" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PortType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PortId" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="PowerSourceInformation" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="OemCharger" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>

Event.Message: CAD-BAT: Notify Usb Charger Status - Size:%1 BatteryTag:%2 InformationLevel:%3 ChargingSourceType:%4 Reserved:%5 Flags:%6 MaxCurrent:%7 Voltage:%8 PortType:%9 PortId:%10 PowerSourceInformation:%11 OemCharger:%12
Event.Template: <template xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/win/2004/08/events"> <data name="Size" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="BatteryTag" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="InformationLevel" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="ChargingSourceType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Reserved" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Flags" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="MaxCurrent" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="Voltage" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PortType" inType="win:UInt32" outType="xs:unsignedInt"/> <data name="PortId" inType="win:UInt64" outType="xs:unsignedLong"/> <data name="PowerSourceInformation" inType="win:Pointer" outType="win:HexInt64"/> <data name="OemCharger" inType="win:GUID" outType="xs:GUID"/> </template>
